Title: Gaddam Gang
Writer: Santhosh Peter Jaykumar (adapted screenplay), Santhosh Peter Jaykumar (dialogue), Srinivas Kavinayam, Nalan Kumarasamy, Writer Mohan (dialogue)
Actors: Achu, Giri Babu, Raghu Babu, Chitram Basha
Plot: Dasu and his gang of newbies, kidnaps a rich politician's son to extract money from him, with his new-found uncanny rules of kidnapping. All his plannings go haywire when an insane cop is brought to handle the case.
